column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Lou's deep dish was good but the butter crust was a bit too buttery tasting for me after the first piece and it wasn't very saucey. We ordered a Medium Pepperoni
column3: and a Family Salad for a family of four (we had 2 slices leftover and were stuffed!).  The salad was HUGE and very good!  We liked the Pepperoni better than the Sausage Pepperoni combo.  After being in Chicago all week and trying Giordano's (twice)
